title: South Carolina death row inmate Richard Moore chooses firing squad over electric chair - New York Post
content:
1. South Carolina death row inmate Richard Moore chooses firing squad over electric chair  New York Post
  2. South Carolina death row inmate chooses to be executed by firing squad over the electric chair  CNN
  3. South Carolina inmate from Spartanburg picks firing squad over electric chair  WYFF News 4
  4. South Carolina Prisoner Chooses to Be Executed by Firing Squad  The New York Times
  5. Richard Moore's execution will make him the first in South Carolina since 2011  News 19 WLTX
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: South Carolina death row inmate Richard Moore chose to be executed by firing squad rather than the electric chair at the end of this month, according to court documents filed Friday.
